title: AI coding startup Lovable CEO envisions AGI as software system; eyes founder
description: The AI vibe coding startup founder said artificial general intelligence (AGI) is achievable by team effort and algorithms. Outlining ambitious plans for 2026, he announced an aggressive hiring push, inviting current and former startup founders—particularly those running their own companies—to join his team in Stockholm.

title: US stocks rose again in 2025 after overcoming turbulence from tariffs and Trump's fight with the Fed
description: The year 2025 was scary good for investors. It was scary because the U.S. stock market plunged to several historic drops on worries about everything from President Donald Trump's tariffs to interest rates to a possible bubble in artificial-intelligence technology.

title: Instagram chief Adam Mosseri warns of fading authenticity in AI driven world
description: Instagram chief Adam Mosseri has cautioned that users can no longer trust online visuals by default as artificial intelligence blurs the line between real and synthetic content.
content: Artificial intelligence has advanced at an extraordinary pace, making it possible for almost anyone to create realistic images and videos with ease. However, this accessibility has also brought challenges for social media platforms that now face an o... [2255 chars]

title: U.S. Stocks Slip in Final Session of 2025 but Finish Year Strong
description: U.S. stock markets closed lower in the final trading session of 2025, ending a volatile year marked by sharp swings, policy uncertainty and sustained enthusiasm for artificial intelligence stocks. title: AI divide: China, SE Asia ahead of US, Europe in adoption
description: According to the 2025 AI Index Report by Stanford’s Institute for Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence (HAI), AI has proven to be more useful in countries such as China, Indonesia, and Thailand in 2025, with adoption or perceived usefulness levels of 83%, 80%, and 77%, respectively.

title: As Google, Musk, Bezos, Altman back space data centres, can sky really be the next frontier for AI
description: Tech giants are planning to build data centres in space. This move is driven by the immense energy and land needs of artificial intelligence. Projects like Google's Suncatcher are in development. Leaders believe space offers abundant solar energy and fewer environmental hurdles.

title: How artificial intelligence became real estate’s new secret weapon
description: CRANBERRY TOWNSHIP, Pennsylvania — Coldwell Banker agent Georgie Smigel used to spend hours digging through spreadsheets and old inquiry lists trying to figure out who might be interested in a new listing.
